Game.Name: King's Bounty - The Conqueror's Quest (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: Raise your sword in the name of the king! Traitors ravish the land and the Sceptre of Order is lost. Build an army of thousands. Lead great legions of orcs, trolls, demons and more to recover the sceptre and restore the king's realm. Discover 8 potent artifacts to increase your skills. Weave spells to aid your quest and destroy your enemies. Do battle with 25 deadly fantasy creatures. Use your leadership skills to unite rival troops in your army. No two games are alike - the playing field resets with each new game. Password command save feature.Cheat: Game has all but 4 villans caught.XMC-DT-PTW B89-YT-0AA EZE-F6-Z3V 39T-9N-5PF 5DJ-MY-JLH MPJ-1K-VXX Y2F-EG-BDJ Then go to Archipella then sail down to the bottom island and go to the most north west of the island and look at the puzzle to find the exact area to search in.
